!Warehouse Keeper Walderal: When you are running a warehouse, whether you like it or not, you get to know all sorts of odd secrets. For example, a few days ago, some high level official whose name I cannot reveal placed with us a very cute needlework doll& The doll was very well made& but it seemed like it wasn t worth the storage fee we charge. What do you think this means?
